content: Create window_title.rs handler in extras/src
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt in extras crate
Add window_title module declaration to extras/src/lib.rs
Update doc comment in extras/src/lib.rs to include set_window_title
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt in extras crate after lib.rs changes
Add set_window_title method registration in extras/src/plugin.rs
Update log_initialization in extras/src/plugin.rs to include set_window_title
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt in extras crate after plugin changes
Run cargo clippy on extras crate and fix issues
Create brp_extras_set_window_title.rs in mcp/src/brp_tools/tools
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt in mcp crate after creating struct file
Add module declaration in mcp/src/brp_tools/tools/mod.rs
Add exports to mcp/src/brp_tools/mod.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt in mcp crate after module updates
Add imports for SetWindowTitleParams and SetWindowTitleResult in tool_name.rs
Add BrpExtrasSetWindowTitle variant to ToolName enum
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after ToolName enum change
Add annotation case for BrpExtrasSetWindowTitle
Add parameters case for BrpExtrasSetWindowTitle
Add get_tool_fn case for BrpExtrasSetWindowTitle
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after all tool_name.rs changes
Run cargo clippy on mcp crate and fix issues
Create help text file mcp/help_text/brp_extras_set_window_title.txt
Run full workspace cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Update extras_plugin.rs example to demonstrate window title change
Run cargo build --example extras_plugin
Create window_title.md test file in .claude/commands/tests
Run cargo nextest run
STOP if test failures - review with user
Subagent: STOP and return control
Main: Task new subagent for code review (read-only)
Review suggestions with user
